Multiple Cranes
The inspiration for this form of Origami came from 'Hiden Senbazuru Orikata'( The Secret of One Thousand Cranes Origami ), the oldest origami book for amusement in the world, published in 1797. The book is a study of a series of origami cranes folded from a single sheet of paper.

"I have taken some of the principles in the book to create a series of 'multiple crane' creations, all folded from a single sheet of paper. The 'Peace Sphere' is a three dimensional globe of 18 cranes and took 5 years to create."
Linda@Origamihara.com
1,000 cranes multiple cranes
